full_text: Screened by NARA 7/18/2023 UNITED STATES DE PIMENT OF JUSTICE CATEGORY B Immigration and Naturalization Service MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE Place Miami, Fla. File No. A20 216 306 Status as a lawful permanent resident of the United States is accorded: SEX DATE OF BIRTH Name SHAH, Haji Islam M 5-26-06 Street 1655 W. 44th Phace Address PLACE OF BIRTH City, State, Zip Apt. 336 Mardan, Pakistan Hialeah, Fla. 33012 NATIONALITY COUNTRY TO WHICH CHARGEABLE (If any) PREFERENCE (If any) Pakistan PRIORITY DATE Pakistan Nonpreference 11-5-75 REMARKS Self-sufficient (3) NONPREFERENCE: Section 212(a)(14) certification not required because: Individual section 212(a)(14) certification issued Blanket section 212(a)(14) certification issued under the following provision of law: Sec 203(h) of the I & N Act Sec 249 of the I & N Act Sec 214(d) I & N Act Private Law no. of the Sec 244( )( ) of the I & N Act Sec 1 of the Act of 11/2/66 Congress session Sec 245 of the I & N Act Sec 13 of the Act of 9/11/57 (Other law Specify) As of at Miami, Fla. (Month) (Day) (Year) PORT OF ENTRY FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE Class of admission (Insert symbol) NP-1 NP-6 (Applicable in all cases) DATE OF RECOMMENDED BY: (Immigration Officer) (Date) ACTION DD DISTRICT FOR USE BY VISA CONTROL OFFICE Date Foreign State Preference Category Number Month of Issuance Signed (Visa Office, Dept. of State) Form 1-357 delivered Form G-153 delivered Form 1-151 Serial No. July 23. 1976 mailed delivered CC: Visa Control Office, Visa Office, Department of State, Washington, D.C. 20520 for allocation of immigrant visa number.
